name: Possessions
description: Control anything*, anywhere, anytime. Supports Jolly Co-op and (partially) Rain Meadow.<LINE><LINE>Controls:<LINE>[V] Start/Stop Possession (Hold to select a target, release to confirm)<LINE>[F] Start/Stop Item Possession (Automatically targets the closest item; Prefers weapons over consumables.)<LINE><LINE>[B] Mind Blast (Requires option "Mind Blast"; Hold V to select the position, then hold B to charge a powerful blast; Releasing B too early may cause death of anything nearby)<LINE><LINE>For extra information, consult the mod's workshop page.<LINE><LINE>* Some creatures (mostly from The Watcher) cannot be possessed due to game limitations. Sorry!
